description: We are an independent escrow company team of 10 people specializing in refinance, sales , commercial and business escrows.  This is a full-time on-site role for an Escrow Assistant at LIVE ESCROW, INC. in Burbank, CA. The Escrow Assistant will be responsible for assisting Escrow Officers with all aspects of the escrow process, handling administrative tasks, preparing documentation, and providing excellent customer service to clients.  Qualifications  Strong organizational skills and attention to detail Excellent communication and customer service skills Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite Knowledge of real estate and escrow processes is a plus
